channel.title: Secret Contact Sharing
channel.description:
Interesting concept from our friend @eyedeekay. Here are my 2 cents which he probably already thought of:
https://github.com/eyedeekay/Secret_Contact_Sharing/issues/1
***
This is posted from my new Github profile thanks to Openmailbox being a colossal turd and abruptly deciding not to receive messages since early this month. Don't recommend them.

item.title: Secret Contact Sharing
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Interesting concept from our friend @eyedeekay. Here are my 2 cents which he probably already thought of:

github.com/eyedeekay/Secret_Contact_Sharing

Issue: One time access

opened by HulaHoop0 on 2019-09-29 
Absolutely fantastic idea to solve the bootstrapping problem of private identities.
I wonder if using a one time access - ephemeral Onion...

This is posted from my new Github profile thanks to Openmailbox being a colossal turd and abruptly deciding not to receive messages since early this month. Donâ€™t recommend them.
